Reviews.Title: “Misleading description, terrible customer service.”
Reviews.Author: RSBrooklyn_NY
Reviews.Content: booked hotel days little bit decided stay opposed central price amenities specifically fitness center jacuzzi wifi restaurant checkin free wifi 30 minutes lobby fitness center hoping run maybe soak afterwards actually jacuzzi looked probably hadnt functional sign saying ditto saunas treadmill belt busted warped tried bicycles neither figured id check staff pretty shrugged shoulders restaurant restaurant buffet breakfast bar basically amenities choose hotel available tried sort rate reduction voucher wifi girl desk shrugged rolled eyes manager available tuesday friday holiday holiday means hotel manager available handle guest days bad heard nh hotels hands travel regularly probably worst customer service experienced supposedly reputable hotel ive stayed hostels staff concerned guest satisfaction

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service, Poor Location”
Reviews.Author: Kdizz23
Reviews.Content: booked trip barcelona boyfriend excited hotel 20 minutes transfer airport using shuttle bus organised thomas cook hotel perfectly clean cleaned everyday towels whenever requested left bathroom floor free safe set code yourself tv bath shower wardrobe probably hotel ive stayed piping hot water fantastic addition service impecable arrival receptionist map identified transports links bus tram wrote map stops visit boyfriend food poisoning poorly lady reception helped translate cleaner sheets drawing directions pharmacy approx 3 blocks telling words spanish negative aspects hotel distance barcelona centre hotel close camp nou football stadium 35 55 minute bus journey centre la rambla ok buses easy easy travelling children uk buses congested peak times negative kichenette tea facility overall holiday brilliant bar food poisoning barcelona beautiful hotel absolutely perfect nh hotels barcelona 100 recommend staying closer city

Reviews.Title: “Good point to start from in the morning”
Reviews.Author: wondermash
Reviews.Content: spent easter 2011 hotel functional clean barcelona cheap staff fantastic helpful friendly 40 mins bus centre barca regular service 1100 pm night bus takes restaurant closed time except breakfast 12 euros overpriced fantastic coffee shop 5 mins hotel main street coffee croissant 3 euros wonderful sandwiches lunch fresh cheap cakes stay barcelona son enjoyed gym wifi free thanks guys reception free codes 30 mins day person

Reviews.Title: “If you're a tourist this hotel is lovely but too far away from Barcelona!”
Reviews.Author: flower1111
Reviews.Content: told travel hotel 10mins bus stop short 20 mins ride barcelona yes wasnt bus stop 50 mins barcelona regular time changed 5 days trip consistent bus cost £140 maximum charge thank goodness living travelling london bus hard leisure holiday hotel fairly reasonably clean breakfast delicious food available evenings 730pm service menu minimal sandwich chips chips cold time arrived quiet deserted mainly guests breakfast sadly heard thin bedroom walls occasion stay staff friendly enought usual hotel staff pleasantries wrong unable unwilling double bed following day spent morning waiting booked cleaned available move luggage tired argue toss night arrived nearly midnight unpacking repacking move fitness centre available staff available mornings barcelona fantastic lots hotels suggest finding alternative enjoyed barcelona enormously wouldnt hotel obvious reasons hope review helps book didnt late
